trans-unit.source: The PropertyCollection class contains the properties of a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe PropertyCollection contém as propriedades de um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified property is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a propriedade especificada está nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: The return value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property belongs to this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade especificada pertence a esta coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the all objects in this collection to an array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os objetos dessa coleção em uma matriz, começando no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyValueCollection"> </xref> objetos que recebe os elementos desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` onde esse método inicia a cópia desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro durante a chamada para a interface subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de propriedades na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Internet Information Services (IIS), and WinNT providers do not currently support Count, so each will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Serviços de informações da Internet (IIS) e provedores de WinNT atualmente não dão contagem, para que cada um gerará um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The number of properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de propriedades na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro durante a chamada para a interface subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The directory cannot report the number of properties.
trans-unit.target: O diretório não pode relatar o número de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que você pode usar para percorrer a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>que você pode usar para percorrer a esta coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro durante a chamada para a interface subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection>

trans-unit.source: In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own.
trans-unit.target: No JScript, você pode usar as propriedades indexadas padrão definidas por um tipo, mas você não pode definir explicitamente as suas próprias.

trans-unit.source: However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property with a type of Object and an index type of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, especificar que o atributo expando em uma classe fornece automaticamente um padrão propriedade com um tipo de objeto e um tipo de índice de <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> indexada

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os nomes das propriedades na coleção.

trans-unit.source: When accessing members of the PropertyNames property, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> might be thrown due to an error while accessing the underlying interface.
trans-unit.target: Ao acessar membros de propriedade PropertyNames, um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>pode ser gerada devido a um erro ao acessar a interface subjacente.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object that contains the names of the properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>objeto que contém os nomes das propriedades na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an <xref:System.Array>, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>para um <xref:System.Array>, a partir de um determinado <xref:System.Array>índice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: o número de elementos na origem - ou - é maior que o espaço disponível do index até o final do destino array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de origem não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de destino array .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (thread-safe).</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>Retorna um objeto, que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementa um método sincronizado, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções que são provenientes de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] O exemplo a seguir mostra como bloquear a coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante toda a enumeração: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se acessar para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (thread-safe); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Para coleções cujo repositório subjacente não está disponível publicamente, a implementação esperada é retornar a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o ponteiro para a instância atual pode não ser suficiente para coleções que agrupam outras coleções; aqueles devem retornar a propriedade de SyncRoot da coleção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementa um método sincronizado, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas podem fornecer sua própria versão sincronizada de coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização necessário realizar operações no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>da coleção, não diretamente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém uma sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando a instância de coleção.

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a Synchronized method on a collection, the expected usage for <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> looks like this: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Na ausência de um método sincronizado em uma coleção, o uso esperado para <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>tem esta aparência: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` enumerando através de um conjunto não é intrinsecamente um procedimento com segurança de thread. </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como bloquear a coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante toda a enumeração: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um elemento com a chave fornecida e o valor para o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A> property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`).
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>propriedade para adicionar novos elementos, definindo o valor de uma chave que não existe no dicionário (por exemplo, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`).</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A> property overwrites the old value.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a chave especificada já existe no dicionário, configurando o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>propriedade substitui o valor antigo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A> method does not modify existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Em contraste, o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A>método não modifica os elementos existentes.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to use as the key of the element to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para usar como a chave do elemento a ser adicionado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to use as the value of the element to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para usar como o valor do elemento a ser adicionado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: An element with the same key already exists in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento com a mesma chave já existe no <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os elementos do <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object contains an element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto contém um elemento com a chave especificada.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizado no <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> contains an element with the key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>contém um elemento com a chave; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but does allow the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção com um tamanho fixo não permite a adição ou remoção de elementos após a coleção é criada, mas permitir a modificação de elementos existentes.

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção com um tamanho fixo é simplesmente uma coleção com um wrapper que impede a adição e remoção de elementos; Portanto, se forem feitas alterações à coleção subjacente, incluindo a adição ou remoção de elementos, a coleção de tamanho fixo reflete as alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto tem um fixa tamanho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que é somente leitura não permite a adição, remoção ou modificação de elementos após a criação da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto é somente leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece a capacidade de acessar um elemento específico na coleção usando a seguinte sintaxe: `myCollection[key]`.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A> property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`).
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>propriedade para adicionar novos elementos, definindo o valor de uma chave que não existe no dicionário (por exemplo, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`).</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A> property overwrites the old value.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a chave especificada já existe no dicionário, configurando o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>propriedade substitui o valor antigo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A> method does not modify existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Em contraste, o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A>método não modifica os elementos existentes.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: A chave do elemento a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: The element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O elemento com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: The property is set and the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é definida e o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- The property is set, key does not exist in the collection, and the has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a propriedade for definida, key não existe na coleção e o tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object containing the keys of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>objeto que contém as chaves de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the keys in the returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object is unspecified, but is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das chaves no retornado <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>objeto não for especificado, mas é garantido para ser a mesma ordem que os valores correspondentes no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Values%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object containing the keys of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>objeto que contém as chaves de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the element with the specified key from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o elemento com a chave especificada do <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: A chave do elemento a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] O `foreach` instrução de linguagem c# (`for each` no Visual Basic) oculta a complexidade dos enumeradores.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, usando `foreach` é recomendado em vez de manipulação direta do enumerador.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores podem ser usados para ler os dados na coleção, mas eles não podem ser usados para modificar a coleção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>também traz o enumerador de volta para essa posição.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Nesta posição, o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você deve chamar <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>para avançar o enumerador para o primeiro elemento da coleção antes de ler o valor de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>Retorna o mesmo objeto até que o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>define <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>para o próximo elemento.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>passa o final da coleção, o enumerador está posicionado após o último elemento da coleção e <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>retorna `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o enumerador está nessa posição, chamadas subsequentes para <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>também retornam `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se a última chamada <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>retornado `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>é indefinido.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>para o primeiro elemento da coleção novamente, você pode chamar <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>seguido pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção permaneça inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se forem feitas alterações à coleção, como adicionar, modificar ou excluir elementos, o enumerador será invalidado irrecuperavelmente e seu comportamento é indefinido.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador não tem acesso exclusivo à coleção; Portanto, enumerando através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração.

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que a coleção a ser acessado por vários threads para leitura e gravação, você deve implementar sua sincronização.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.object.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the values of the properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores das propriedades na coleção.

trans-unit.source: When accessing members of the Values property, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception might be thrown due to an error while accessing the underlying interface.
trans-unit.target: Ao acessar membros de propriedade de valores, um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>exceção pode ser gerada devido a um erro ao acessar a interface subjacente.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values of the properties in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores das propriedades na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
